[[/>]]







= Iâ€™ve got a list of ideas that keeps growing (80 ideas so far)â€¦ So why not just make them into SCPâ€™s/Tales? Hiyo! I'm [[*user Strange Matter]]and welcome to my authorâ€™s page! Where I strive to do my best. I even got myself an **[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/strange-matter-art-hub Art Hub]** in case you wanna check it out!

In the event I am inactive for more than 2+ years. All of my co-authored works will go to their respective authors and I retain full ownership of any solo work with [[*user Miss Lapis]] to be their custodian. Thanks for stopping by, and take care now! ðŸ‘‹ðŸŒŸ
